title: 80-90 ping and 200+ fps Still have got Lags ! help me GUYS </3
body:
lately i've been having a little delay in my gameplay ! not only in teamfights but also when i change walking directions or cs there is always a delay  witch makes the game really unplayable !!! 
i put my fps to 60 from uncapped nothing happened !
very low graphics !

Important NOTE ! I am using USB cable connecting my phone to the PC and using teathring to connect my 4G phone internet bundle to my Pc 
another NOTE that i have been using this type of connection for a while and i didnt have this problem so i dont think it is the connection it self :0 help bros 
!!!! * {{champion:122}}  RAGES and {{champion:32}}  cries *

replies.body:
same probel.only its 500 and 600 ms.
been happenig for a week

It sounds like you're having an unstable connection issue to the game server, likely resulting from pocket loss.  Using 4G to play League is likely the culprit and giving you these delays.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to be sure of this.  It may be necessary use a stronger connection to smoothly communicate data between your network and our game servers.  I hope that helps!

It would be great if you can please address the actual issue and not give a textbook response. When the issue all of a sudden arises for multiple people experiencing the same thing (including myself), it's plainly obvious that it's not a personal issue on our end.
I would post a video but am on .y phone for now

Oh OK I will try getting a router and see what happens 
Thanks
